description: A middle-aged, wealthy male entrepreneur with strong conservative political views, skeptical of climate change, and opposed to government regulation.
A young, gender-nonbinary individual from an urban area, deeply involved in social justice movements, advocating for radical systemic change.
An elderly, devoutly religious woman who opposes modern gender theories, abortion, and secularism, valuing family and tradition above all.
A Silicon Valley-based software engineer in their 30s, favoring minimal government intervention, free markets, and skeptical of 'woke' culture.
A self-sufficient, distrustful of institutions, middle-aged man living off-grid, preparing for societal collapse with strong anti-government views.
A working-class, unionized factory worker in their 40s, advocating for wealth redistribution, universal healthcare, and strong labor rights.
A university professor in gender studies, outspoken about patriarchy, systemic oppression, and the need for intersectional feminism.
A homeschooling mother of four, deeply distrustful of mainstream medicine, vaccines, and government health recommendations.
A retired army officer with nationalist tendencies, valuing discipline, patriotism, and skeptical of immigration and multiculturalism.
An older, blue-collar worker from a fossil fuel-dependent region, dismissing climate science as elitist propaganda threatening their livelihood.
